member.summary: Sends an error tracking information to the server.

File in which the error occurred.
Number of the line on which the error occurred.

member.summary: Sends an error tracking information to the server.
member.exception: Thrown when the instance is not configured properly.

member.summary: Fired when the notice to the Airbrake is sent successfully.

member.summary: Fired when the notice to the Airbrake server fails to be send.

member.name: T:Airbraker.Data.AirbrakeError
member.summary: Represents an Airbrake error class.

member.name: P:Airbraker.Data.AirbrakeError.Class
member.summary: Required. The class name or type of error that occurred.

member.name: P:Airbraker.Data.AirbrakeError.Message
member.summary: Optional. A short message describing the error that occurred.

member.name: P:Airbraker.Data.AirbrakeError.TraceLines
member.summary: Required. This element can occur more than once. Each line element describes one code location or frame in the backtrace when the error occurred, and requires @file and @number attributes. If the location includes a method or function, the @method attribute should be used.

member.name: T:Airbraker.Data.AirbrakeNotice
member.summary: Represents an Airbrake notice class.

member.name: M:Airbraker.Data.AirbrakeNotice.ToArray
member.summary: Serializes the object to byte array.

member.name: P:Airbraker.Data.AirbrakeNotice.ApiKey
member.summary: Required. The API key for the project that this error belongs to. The API key can be found by viewing the edit project form on the Airbrake site.

member.name: P:Airbraker.Data.AirbrakeNotice.Notifier
member.summary: Gets or sets the for the notice.

member.name: P:Airbraker.Data.AirbrakeNotice.Error
member.summary: Gets or sets the error.

member.name: P:Airbraker.Data.AirbrakeNotice.Request
member.summary: Optional. If this error occurred during an HTTP request, the children of this element can be used to describe the request that caused the error.

member.name: P:Airbraker.Data.AirbrakeNotice.ServerEnvironment
member.summary: Optional. The path to the project in which the error occurred, such as RAILS_ROOT or DOCUMENT_ROOT.

member.name: P:Airbraker.Data.AirbrakeNotice.CurrentUser
member.summary: Gets or sets the data.

member.name: P:Airbraker.Data.AirbrakeNotice.Version
member.summary: Required. The version of the API being used. Should be set to "2.3"

member.name: T:Airbraker.Data.AirbrakeNotifier
member.summary: Represents an Airbrake notifier class.

member.name: M:Airbraker.Data.AirbrakeNotifier.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Airbraker.Data.AirbrakeNotifier.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Creates a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:Airbraker.Data.AirbrakeNotifier.Name
member.summary: Required. The name of the notifier client submitting the request, such as "hoptoad4j" or "rack-hoptoad."

member.name: P:Airbraker.Data.AirbrakeNotifier.Version
member.summary: Required. The version number of the notifier client submitting the request.

member.name: P:Airbraker.Data.AirbrakeNotifier.Url
member.summary: Required. A URL at which more information can be obtained concerning the notifier client.

member.name: T:Airbraker.Data.AirbrakeRequest
member.summary: Represents a class that describes a request that caused an error.

member.name: P:Airbraker.Data.AirbrakeRequest.Url
member.summary: Required only if there is a request element. The URL at which the error occurred.

member.name: P:Airbraker.Data.AirbrakeRequest.Component
member.summary: Required only if there is a request element. The component in which the error occurred. In model-view-controller frameworks like Rails, this should be set to the controller. Otherwise, this can be set to a route or other request category.

member.name: P:Airbraker.Data.AirbrakeRequest.Action
member.summary: Optional. The action in which the error occurred. If each request is routed to a controller action, this should be set here. Otherwise, this can be set to a method or other request subcategory.

member.name: P:Airbraker.Data.AirbrakeRequest.Params
member.summary: Optional. A list of var elements describing request parameters from the query string, POST body, routing, and other inputs. See the section on var elements below.

member.name: P:Airbraker.Data.AirbrakeRequest.Session
member.summary: Optional. A list of var elements describing session variables from the request. See the section on var elements below.

member.name: P:Airbraker.Data.AirbrakeRequest.CgiData
member.summary: Optional. A list of var elements describing CGI variables from the request, such as SERVER_NAME and REQUEST_URI. See the section on var elements below.

member.name: T:Airbraker.Data.AirbrakeServerEnvironment
member.summary: Represents a server environment.

member.name: P:Airbraker.Data.AirbrakeServerEnvironment.Project
member.summary: Gets or sets the project root name, where the error occurred.

member.name: P:Airbraker.Data.AirbrakeServerEnvironment.Environment
member.summary: Required. The name of the server environment in which the error occurred, such as "staging" or "production."

member.name: P:Airbraker.Data.AirbrakeServerEnvironment.AppVersion
member.summary: Optional. The version of the application that this error came from. If the App Version is set on the project, then errors older than the project's app version will be ignored. This version field uses Semantic Versioning style versioning.

member.name: P:Airbraker.Data.AirbrakeServerEnvironment.Hostname
member.summary: Gets or sets the environment hostname.

member.name: T:Airbraker.Data.AirbrakeTraceLine
member.summary: Represents a line element, that describes one code location or frame in the backtrace when the error occurred.

member.name: M:Airbraker.Data.AirbrakeTraceLine.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Airbraker.Data.AirbrakeTraceLine.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates a new instance of the class.
member.param: Name of the method in which the error occurred.
File in which the error occurred.
Number of the line on which the error occurred.

member.name: P:Airbraker.Data.AirbrakeTraceLine.File
member.summary: Gets or sets the file in which the error occurred.

member.name: P:Airbraker.Data.AirbrakeTraceLine.LineNumber
member.summary: Gets or sets the line number on which the error occurred.

member.name: P:Airbraker.Data.AirbrakeTraceLine.Method
member.summary: Gets or sets the method in which the error occurred.

member.name: T:Airbraker.Data.AirbrakeVar
member.summary: The params, session, and cgi-data elements can contain one or more var elements for each parameter or variable that was set when the error occurred. Each var element should have a @key attribute for the name of the variable, and element text content for the value of the variable.

member.name: P:Airbraker.Data.AirbrakeVar.VarArray
member.summary: Gets or sets the array of variables.

member.name: P:Airbraker.Data.AirbrakeVar.Text
member.summary: Gets or sets the text content for the value of the variable.

member.name: P:Airbraker.Data.AirbrakeVar.Key
member.summary: Gets or sets the key attribute for the name of the variable.

member.name: T:Airbraker.RegexStackTraceLineParser
member.summary: Represents a simple parser of stack trace information.

member.name: M:Airbraker.RegexStackTraceLineParser.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a new instance of the class. Default regex expression is set to: @"at (?<method>.*) in (?<file>.*):line (?<line>\d*)"

member.summary: Creates a new instance of the class.
member.param: Regex expression that matches the stack trace line description.

member.name: M:Airbraker.RegexStackTraceLineParser.Parse(System.String)
member.summary: Parses a stack trace string into enumeration.
member.param: String data containing the stack trace information.
